ImpulseVelocity.description: Speed at which the player is launched when the reel reaches its peak.

IsWaitUp.description: True: Waits until an event activates it, causing it to lower. False: Lowered by default, allowing Sonic to use it.

OutOfControl.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player after the reel reaches its peak.

UpSpeedMax.description: Speed at which the handle rises.

Extra.name: A handle on a wire which moves Sonic upwards when grabbed.
